Services: App Design | App Development


Client: .BRIF – easy email, Israel


The Challenge: To transform the common Email Interface into a Seamless Communication tool of 21st Century.


Brif’s initiative is to make email as simple as Whatsapp, yet robust and powerful as Your traditional email.

Our team put an emphasis on designing an engaging experience, one that can change the way consumers and brands interact with each other. The result is an innovative, on-brand user interface. Our user centered strategy puts the decision-making processes of the users at the center of every solution.


Lead Designers - Sagi Rechter, Nati Ollech

App Developers - Ofer Sarid, Roy Ganor
